newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: CAP GEMINI TAKES MINORITY STAKE IN EC GATE.
newsitem.headline: CAP GEMINI TAKES MINORITY STAKE IN EC GATE.

text.p: Dutch software firm Cap Gemini said on Monday it had taken a minority stake in EC Gate, a new Dutch company specialising in electronic commerce (on-line business to business services).
Electronic Commerce is a blanket term for all dealings between businesses conducted electronically via computer and telecoms networks, including electronic data interchange and the Internet.
Cap Gemini said that due to the increasing popularity of the Internet the market for electronic commerce was expected to grow strongly over the coming years.
It said that one U.S. market research company was predicting that U.S. electronic commerce via the Internet would mushroom from 15 billion dollars in 1996 to 200 billion in the year 2000.
Cap Gemini did not elaborate on the financial details of the transaction.
